title: Rochester's Beer Buddies
body: <p><a href="http://www.democratandchronicle.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20060221/LIVING0101/602210308"><img src="http://www.democratandchronicle.com/graphics/columnists/mug_beerbuddies.jpg" alt="The Beer Buddies" /></a></p><p><a href="http://www.democratandchronicle.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20060221/LIVING0101/602210308">These guys are like the Chuck Norris's of beer</a>. Except they don't have beards or roundhouse kicks. Plus there's three of them, so I guess they're more like the three amigos or the three musketeers, or maybe the three stooges or something. In any case I look forward to their new column in the D&amp;C. </p><p>I've been aching to make another batch of homebrew, but with our upcoming wedding, it's been on the back burner. I hope they let me help out with their home-brewing experiments. I'm always trying to get others interested, but usually all they end up doing is drinking my beer.</p>
